\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[86ee4ea7c7a0b23c402782c011838916]%mdk
$\Pr[D_d(M(E_e(m_b))) = m_b + 1] = 1 - negl$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

$b$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c3756a3108bedc440ee6eb34c0619164]%mdk
$\mathcal{A}(1^n,e) = b$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={54}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[10c8ac5ffc133bb4514f977197c5787c]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={57}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[\mathcal{A}(1^n,e) = b] &= \Pr[\mathcal{A}(1^n,e) = 1 \mid b = 0]\Pr[b = 0] + \Pr[\mathcal{A}(1^n,e) =1 \mid b = 1]\Pr[b = 0] \\
&= \frac{1}{2}[\Pr[D_d(M(E_e(x))) = x + 1] + \Pr[D_d(M(E_e(x+1))) \neq x + 1]] \\
&= \frac{1}{2}[1 - negl + 1 - negl] \\
&= 1 - negl \\
&> \frac{1}{2} + negl'
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c4ca4238a0b923820dcc509a6f75849b]%mdk
$1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={142}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[500be9ebb4b0042036aaedfba4374d8d]%mdk
$\frac{1}{k}\sum_{i=1}^k X_i > \frac{1}{2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={142}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[cfcd208495d565ef66e7dff9f98764da]%mdk
$0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={142}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[85b145ca74b1a0fee671be3f2c4846f7]%mdk
$\frac{1}{k} \sum_{i=1}^k X_i < \frac{1}{2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={143}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7788b409a9b3225cf8aecc6149a2bd2e]%mdk
$x \in L$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={144}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7da3f9417e349bc472da3b128413cd70]%mdk
$V(x)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={144}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[eea7d45c0766825533ec4872f90adeb8]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={147}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[V(x) = 1] &= 1 - \Pr[V(x) = 0] \\
&= 1 - \Pr[\frac{1}{k} \sum_{i=1}^k X_i < \frac{1}{2}] \\
&= 1 - \Pr[\frac{2}{3} - \frac{1}{k} \sum_{i=1}^k X_i > \frac{1}{6}] \\
&> 1 - \Pr[E[X_i] - \frac{1}{k} \sum_{i=1}^k X_i > \frac{1}{6}] \\
&\geq 1 - \Pr[|E[X_i] - \frac{1}{k} \sum_{i=1}^k X_i| > \frac{1}{6}]  \\
&= 1 - 2^{-\frac{k}{144}}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8ce4b16b22b58894aa86c421e8759df3]%mdk
$k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c4ca4238a0b923820dcc509a6f75849b]%mdk
$1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={157}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8ce4b16b22b58894aa86c421e8759df3]%mdk
$k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={159}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[1ab1edcce468871fa86b68a6a26ff7dc]%mdk
$k > 144 \log 0.1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8e681b85e2ea0786a5bcdc939df91b34]%mdk
$x \notin L$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={161}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce]%mdk
$V$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={161}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7247767256f5aef95a2147aceb81abcc]%mdk
$P^*$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={161}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[ae37f283c02c6da947d8b58945b522dd]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={163}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[V(x) = 1] &= \Pr[\frac{1}{k}\sum_{i=1}^k X_i > \frac{1}{2}] \\
&= Pr[\frac{1}{k}\sum_{i=1}^k X_i - \frac{1}{3} > \frac{1}{6}] \\
&< Pr[\frac{1}{k}\sum_{i=1}^k X_i - E[X_i] > \frac{1}{6}] \\
&\leq Pr[|\frac{1}{k}\sum_{i=1}^k X_i - E[X_i]| > \frac{1}{6}] \\
&= 2^{-\frac{k}{144}} 
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={171}

%mdk-data-line={171}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7247767256f5aef95a2147aceb81abcc]%mdk
$P^*$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
